TerritoryAdminAssignment.name: TerritoryAdminAssignment
TerritoryAdminAssignment.description: Represents designated team members who can administer specific territories and their descendants.

CanManageHierarchy.description: Lets the user update and delete the territory and its descendants, and create descendants.

CanManageMembers.description: Lets the user assign other team members to the territory and its descendants. Also lets the user update the user territory association log.

CanManageRecordAssociations.description: Lets the user add and remove assignments for records, author rules, and assign and run rules for the territory and its descendants.

Territory2Id.description: The ID for the territory you’re letting the user administer. The user can also administer this territory’s descendants.

Territory2ModelId.description: The ID for the territory model that includes the territory you’re letting the user administer.

UserOrGroupId.description: The ID for the user you’re letting administer the territory and its descendants. Requires that the user is assigned the Administer Territory Operations permission set.
